summary: Feature request to allow ApplicationFailure exceptions thrown from within update handlers to fail the workflow directly, instead of requiring a workaround with flags and conditional logic in the workflow code.
userImpact: Users must implement awkward workarounds with flags to fail workflows from update handlers, making the API less intuitive.
proposedFix: throw ApplicationFailure should return WorkflowFailedError instead of WorkflowUpdateFailedError when called from an update handler.
workaround: Set a flag in the update handler and check for it in the workflow code to throw the failure.
keyQuote: throw ApplicationFailure should return (or at least have the option to return) WorkflowFailedError instead of WorkflowUpdateFailedError.
